runs.comm: a hint of away movement first up, good lines just outside off, played to point
goes fuller and straighter, Irfan hits in the air to mid-on but doesn't carry
away movement again outside off, Atkinson tentatively pushes at it but is beaten
great lines, just outside the off stump and away swing again, Atkinson is beaten once more
finally gets bat on it, Dawlat goes a bit fuller which finds the outer half of Atkinson's bat and it rolls away to third man
short outside off and Irfan aims to deposit it over the boundary but toe-ends it to mid-on instead
goes short first up, and Atkinson picks the length early and pulls it away in front of deep midwicket
back of a length from Zadran, not much movement though, Atkinson runs the ball off his bat to third man
bangs it in short and well directed, aimed for the badge, Irfan ducks under it
good length and at a fourth stump line, patted into the cover region
gets it to move across the right-hander a touch, Atkinson stays back and plays the shorter length to point
sticks to the same lines and length, just back of a length, Atkinson advances and drills it straight to mid-off
overpitched on middle and Ahmed gets one foot out of the way and strokes it beautifully over mid-off, clears the boundary by a distance
varies the length, just back of a length and played to point
Atkinson awkwardly plays the back of a length delivery back to the bowler
attempts to heave the shorter length over cow corner, advances down the track to the shorter length delivery but fails to connect
full on leg stump, patted straight to midwicket
back of a length again, defended into the cover region
repeats the shorter length but good line just outside off, beats the edge
full outside off and Ahmed swings it over cover, just uses the pace and smashes it
goes shorter outside off, guided down to third man
beauty at 135 kph, quick and full and a hint of away seam movement beats Atkinson's half-prod
picks the length this time and Atkinson uses the pace and guides it behind backward point, it races away for four
full and wide outside off stump, Atkinson drives at the ball but gets the inner half of the bat and rolls away to mid-on
short outside off at 115 kph, driven off the backfoot to cover point
a hint of away movement again, beats Atkinson's attempted slog but not cleanly collected by the keeper
the change in pace works, a lot slower and at a fuller length, Irfan aims to clear the infield but hits it down the throat of mid-on. No timing on that stroke
126 kph this time, slightly fuller on off stump, hit to cover
advances down the track with the keeper standing back, and tries to hit it through the off side but doesn't connect
overpitched this time outside off and driven to cover point with no timing again, but a misfield allows them the one
tosses it up but too full, easily driven down to long-off
fires it in short on leg stump, Atkinson stays back and drives to mid-on off the backfoot
darted in again and goes on with the arm again, there is a muted appeal but going down leg
slower this time but still short, Nizakat flat bats it to long-off
well played, poor delivery though. Darts it in down leg and he uses the pace as a fine lap sweep gets it past fine-leg
attempts it again, but this time can't get bat on it, hits his thigh pad and rolls away
low full toss to start, driven down to long-on
drifts on his pads this time, easily clipped away to deep square leg
fuller on middle, the batsman gives himself room and drives it powerfully past cover
again down leg, the flick is missed but just clips the pad
fired at a fuller length on leg stump, Nizakat misses the glance as it hits his pads
low full toss to finish a good over, drilled to long-on
given a bit of flight but too short, pulled away to deep square leg
shorter this time, Atkinson skips down the track and pats it away to long-on
flighted but down the leg side
given a lot more flight but Nizakat gets down the track and meets the ball as he lofts it easily over long-off
dropped, Should have been taken, Nizakat goes for the sweep but gets a top-edge where it carries to deep square leg, but is put down by dawlat
tossed up, drilled down the ground
short on middle, easily clipped away on the leg side
tight line of the off stump, driven easily to long-off
stays with the same line and at a full length, smashed to cover
goes a bit wider on this occasion, Nizakat drives it past point where they run through for two
wider and shorter, cut to point off the front foot
back of a length on middle, Nizakat waits and punches down to long-on
full on middle, glanced to midwicket for only one
fired in outside off and full, can't get enough bat on it, hits his inside edge
slower this time and gets a bit of spin, hit back to the bowler
full and quick again, smashed back at Nabi
takes the pace off this time, a bit of turn, turned away to midwicket
low full toss which is hit straight to midwicket again
slower and on off, he advances down the track and clips it but finds midwicket again
the pressure has finally released, picks the length from Ashraf, he stays in his crease and deposits it into the stands over long-on, great shot
goes back to the low full toss, Atkinson clips it to long-on
good change in pace - a lot slower on middle, punched to midwicket
great ball, pitches outside off and seams away to beat Nizakat's drive, good take from Shahzad standing up too
very slow this time, 102 kph, Atkinson waits for it and punches to long-on
low full toss to finish a good spell, driven to long-off for one
slower on middle, Nizakat gives himself room and drives it past cover but long-on mops up
darted it on his pads, Nizakat can't get bat on that
attempts the sweep and there is a muted appeal, close call that, given leg-byes too
darted in on leg once more, fails to connect again
driven down to long-off
is that a drop? smashed back to Sharifuddin but it pops out of his hands
full and outside off, Atkinson gives himself room and drives it to the sweeper with no timing
short and wide outside off, just inside the wide line, Nizakat gives himself too much room and can't connect

gone this time! He sticks with the full length and the wide line outside off, Nizakat gives himself room again but connects this time with his cut. However, it flies off the outside half to third man. Good running catch from Mangal, too.
full just outside off, beats Atkinson for pace, another dot
short and wide and cut past point, can't find the fence though, Hong Kong need to kick on now with eight wickets in hand
back of a length outside off stump, Atkinson drives off the front foot to point
full and outside off again, the cut is not connected well, finds the inside edge
well bowled, full and darted on leg stump, Atkinson tries to sweep but is beaten for pace
short and wide outside off again, no length balls being provided here, Chapman cuts to the sweeper
provides a length ball on middle this time, Atkisnon skips down the track and gets an inside edge which rolls down to the fine leg boundary
low full toss, smashed back to the bowler
Atkinson comes down the track and converst a length delivery into a yorker, patted back to the bowler again
big shout but a bit high, Zadran bowls a good length delivery hitting the top of off, but strikes Chapman on his thigh pad
goes for it this time and executes well, poor ball from Zadran, a full ball which Atkinson accepts, he stays in his crease and belts it over long-on for a massive six
slower ball this time, Atkinson doesn't time this as he squirts the ball down to long-on
full and straight at 124 kph, Chapman can only get it down to long-on
full toss outside off, Zadran is aiming to get it inside that wide line, but just drifts outside
straight to long-off. Huge wicket. Bowls it outside off at a full length, Atkinson connects but doesn't time it well enough and picks out long-off to perfection.
drifts on Chapman's pads but can't get adequate connection. It clips something and rolls away to fine leg but is pulled in just inside
fired in on leg stump, Chapman gives himself room and smashes it to long-on
well picked, Chapman anticipates the full, fast delivery and sweeps well to fine leg
full outside off, Chapman gets it down to third man
fired in again, hit to long-off
darted in past leg stump again, Chapman gives himself room but is beaten on the drive.
full toss outside off, squirts it down to third man where there is a bad misfield, it goes straight through Zadran's legs, poor fielding
low full toss on middle, hit down to long-off
slower ball on middle, Chapman waits for it and wait for it some more, and hits it past midwicket for an important boundary
short outside off, Chapman can't connect well enough, hits his inside edge and rolls away to square leg
low full toss on leg stump, good bowling, clipped down to long-on. 42 off 20 now.
a front-foot no ball, cannot afford that. Bowls it well outside off, would have been called wide if not a no ball
slower ball, short and on leg stump. Brave from Dawlat, Chapman tries to hit it over short fine-leg, but misses
vital boundary, Dawlat bowls it at a good length on middle, Chapman gives himself room and scythes it over point where it trickles away to the boundary
well executed yorker on middle, hit back to the bowler but a misfield allows them one
reverse-seep this time, and well executed too. Wait for the dart, and connects well to get it past point
smashes Shahzad on the helmet, Chapman wait for the slower ball and he paddles it straight into his helmet, saved four there
hit to cover
Hong Kong needed a boundary and they got it, gives himself room again and smashes it over long-on for a much required six
fired on leg stump, misses the sweep but they run one to keep Chapman on strike
poor fielding from Afghanistan, full ball on middle, Chapam finds cover but a needless poor throw beats Zadran and they run an overthrow
attempted yorker just misses the off stump and Chapman's cut too
great shot, Chapman just anticipates the ball and guides the low full toss to the fine-leg boundary off his lap sweep, lands just inside too
well bowled, wide outside off and full, Chapman attempts the lap sweep again but just squirts it to square leg
good ball just when they needed it, full yorker outside off, Chapman can't do anything with that, beats him
full yorker attempted and Chapman hits to long-on for just one
full and darted on leg, and Chapman picks it again and hits it well too, but deep midwicket is lurking and takes a good high-pressure catch. Match-changing ball that
bad full toss, poor ball from Nabi, Hayat gets a couple of steps down the track and swats it away past fine leg
what has Nabi done? he bowls another poor full toss, which Hayat picks and smashes over deep midwicket
full and wide, just a bit too wide
Hayat comes forward and converts it into a full toss, he hits it to deep midwicket again and some magnificent running gives them three. All the pressure on Nabi now
high full toss again, Afzal finds no timing and hits the upper half of his bat and hits it back to Nabi. Nabi collects it and calmly runs to the non-strikers end.

Low full toss again from Nabi, but Babar manages to hit it past cover, where it is fielded at long-on but they easily come back for two. A wide throw has given Hong Kong a spot in the World T20 in India. As soon as it beat cover, they were always going to run two but Najibullah at long-off collected cleanly but returned the throw right in the middle of the pitch. Huge win for Hong Kong
